meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a canton.
meanings.sent1: The cantonal flag proudly displayed the colors of the region.
meanings.sent2: The cantonal government made decisions for the local area.
meanings.sent3: The cantonal cows seemed to have their own special dance.
meanings.sent4: The cantonal spirit filled the air with unity and pride.
meanings.sent5: The cantonal architecture reflected the unique culture of the area.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a canton or cantons.
meanings.sent1: She wore a cantonal dress to represent her heritage.
meanings.sent2: The cantonal borders were clearly marked on the map.
meanings.sent3: The cantonal picnic turned into a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: His cantonal loyalty never wavered, no matter where he traveled.
meanings.sent5: The cantonal dialect was distinct from the neighboring regions.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a canton or cantons.
meanings.sent1: The cantonal cuisine featured local ingredients and flavors.
meanings.sent2: Cantonal traditions were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The cantonal festival brought joy to the entire community.
meanings.sent4: In the cantonal elections, every voice was heard.
meanings.sent5: The cantonal landscape was breathtaking, with mountains and lakes.
